## Abstract

This vignette describes how to fit a state-space model to `MaddisonData` using `GBR` and `USA` as examples. 

## Get the data 

```{r getData}
library(MaddisonData)
str(GBR <- MaddisonData[MaddisonData$ISO=='GBR', ])
str(USA <- MaddisonData[MaddisonData$ISO=='USA', ])
```

oops: USA starts with 1820, but Maddison has data on `pop` in year 1 and `gdppc` in 1650.
